Back to Franz Schubert

Franz Schubert

Three Minuets, D 380

1816

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 7'

  • 1. E major
  • 2. A major
  • 3. C major

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/6 · BA 5529 · Tänze I · ed. Walburga Litschauer
  • Henle · HN 74 · Sämtliche Tänze / Band I · ed. Paul Mies [without the unfinished trio of no. 3]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50022 · Sämtliche Tänze für Klavier / Band 2 · ed. Alexander Weinmann

1. E major

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. A major

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

3. C major

The first trio is incomplete and the second trio is missing.

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5
